hi! this deck is about

wags.fm

so that's wags.fm!

we're building the world's first programmable radio station, where all of the music is editable in real time.

wags is all about collaboration

the editor below can host up to 100 musicians collaborating on the same work. open the link https://yap.wags.fm/p/deck from your phone and see for yourself!

all-in on the creator economy

wags.fm counts everything. each time a sample is played or an effect is used, we make it the object of a small transaction. artists across the musical supply chain get paid fairly and immediately.

we're building a team

we are looking for passionate music-industry experts that believe in the technology and the vision of the project to help get it into the hands of millions of creators and billions of listeners.
